# Ideas For New Case Formats

## One-Three-Nine Branched Cases

Cases do not follow one format or formula. A format that several case authors have talked about is __branching cases__, where students can follow different paths through the case. Aside from writing so much content, there is the practical challenge of managing the students' workflow.

__Twine__ is an open-source application for writing interactive, non-linear stories. Twine creates single-page HTML documents that contain multiple sub-windows. Windows are connected together so viewers can read one window, then pick where they want to go next. Twine would be an ideal platform for writing branched cases. 

[Learn more about Twine here.](https://twinery.org/)
